com.google.appinventor.components.runtime.util

Class FroyoUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.appinventor.components.runtime.util.FroyoUtil

  • public class FroyoUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper methods for calling methods added in Froyo (2.2, API level 8).

      • getRotation

        public static int getRotation(Display display)
        Calls Display#getRotation()
        Returns:
        one of android.view.Surface#ROTATION_0, android.view.Surface#ROTATION_90, android.view.Surface#ROTATION_180, or android.view.Surface#ROTATION_180.

      • setAudioManager

        public static AudioManager setAudioManager(Activity activity)
        Utility method that returns and AudioManager for the Activity passed in
        Parameters:
        activity - the Activity that will be associated to the AudioManager
        Returns:
        the AudioManager object for the passed Activity

      • setAudioFocusChangeListener

        public static java.lang.Object setAudioFocusChangeListener(Player player)
        Utility method to generate a listener for changed on Focus. Only available in API Level 8
        Parameters:
        player - the player which focus will be watched for
        Returns:
        a listener object with associated callbacks for each state.

      • focusRequestGranted

        public static boolean focusRequestGranted(AudioManager am,
                                          java.lang.Object afChangeListener)
        Utility method that
        Parameters:
        am - the AudioManager requesting the focus
        afChangeListener - the foucs listener associated to the AudioManager
        Returns:
        true if focus is granted, false if not.

      • abandonFocus

        public static void abandonFocus(AudioManager am,
                                java.lang.Object afChangeListener)
        Utility method to abandon audio focus given an AudioManager object
        Parameters:
        am - the AudioManager object
        afChangeListener - the foucs listener associated to the AudioManager

      • getWebViewClient

        public static WebViewClient getWebViewClient(boolean ignoreErrors,
                                             boolean followLinks,
                                             Form form,
                                             Component component)
        Get a special WebViewClient that handles SslError. This is used so the App Inventor programmer can permit https connections to sites with self signed certificates. It represents a security risk because a Man in the Middle (MITM) attack will not be detected if we ignore SslErrors.
        Parameters:
        ignoreErrors - set to true to ignore errors
